name: Electionselection
tagline: Web App for deciding on Candidates based on  platform consistencies
body: This is a web based application that helps users decide on a candidate based on their views of the Major topics.After Making an initial selection the user is presented topics, and questioned on their stances'f their stances align with a canidate, the user is presented with a new set, but if the user picks contrary to their candidate decision they are showed contextual evidence of the candidates stance on the issue.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
